title: Am I gay or confused? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kissing is not really the standard to be measuring such things by. You can kiss your grandparents and parents, brothers and sisters, strangers and friends. There are sexual kisses to be sure, but other acts are much more cut and dry. For example: Who do you want to get naked with? Who do you want to make love to? Who do you fall in love with? Why would you be feeling guilty about your dreams… and why do you use baby talk for things like masturbation… which I presume is what “guilty pleasures” means? Sexuality is normal and adult. Nothing to be ashamed of or guilty over. So before you decide what your orientation is, I would be examining your feelings of guilt and shame and why being a normal human embarrasses you. It sounds like you are some degree of bisexual… leaning much more to the gay side of bisexuality. Once you have your guilt issues worked out, go out on some dates with both genders. Enjoy yourself and discover who you are. You don't have to have sex to date and see how you feel. Good luck!

Dude, you’re gay…. I was thinking about your question some more this afternoon because you had written “which I’m not proud of”, when talking about you thinking of guys in your guilty pleasures. I think the main issue here for you is that you need to stop viewing being gay as wrong … there’s nothing wrong with you thinking of men in a sexual way - if you’re gay then it’s a natural thing to do. Your issue is being ‘ok’ with you being gay. I can’t think of much aside from your religious background that perhaps is making you feel guilty? If this is the case, I relate to the feeling and the fear involved. What I learnt on my journey to becoming ‘ok’ with being gay is that God, or whomever your Higher Power is, created you and loves you for who you are - the REAL battle comes in not from your Higher Power but from you .. your Higher Power will love you irregardless .. the battle is for you to start loving yourself as you are and with no excuses .. you have nothing to prove or explain to anybody. To ensure happiness in your life you have to try as hard as you can to always remain true and authentic to yourself - as long as you’re ok with you, then all will be ok with what’s around you. Good luck my friend

If you are not gay, you may be bisexual. But you may be straight. You see, straight people often explore homosexuality in their fantasies and vice verse. The way to know is to engage in sexual behaviors with another guy. If you enjoy it and want to do it more, then you are bisexual if not gay. Then, if you engage in sexual behaviors with a girl, and don’t enjoy it, and don’t feel like doing more, then you are gay, in all likelihood. That is the best way to know that I am familiar with. In any event, play safe, use condoms, etc…

Kept dening im gay.for years wearing my wife dresses and knickers etc. Even many years ago i was getting an urg to buy gay porn it seemed to turn me on .wife has gone i want to be a girl it feels so right. Last 7 years bin watching gay porn and i love it seeing naked men. Women dont give me an erection no more.
If you realise the normal and healthy function of the bodies, you are not going to be confused anymore. Best wishes
